CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Wells Fargo is one of the largest banks in the United States, with approximately $1.9 trillion in balance sheet assets. The company is split into four primary segments: consumer banking, commercial banking, corporate and investment banking, and wealth and investment management.

value.name: Scott E. Powell
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Executive VP
